title: Tour de France 2025 Route: Ventoux and Crushing ‘Queen Stage’ Headline Course to Test Tadej Pogačar
content:
No cobbles or gravel, but plenty of drama should be delivered in a route heavy on uphill finals and explosive breakaway stages.

Read the full article at Tour de France 2025 Route: Ventoux and Crushing ‘Queen Stage’ Headline Course to Test Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
